com.snap2d.gl.opengl

Class Texture2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.snap2d.gl.opengl.Texture2D

  • public class Texture2D
extends Object
    Wrapper for JOGL Texture class. Not all methods are covered. Direct access can be obtained through getTextureObject(). JOGL libraries must be in your build path to use the classes directly.
    Author:
    Brian Groenke
